name: Security Headers Analysis
description:
HTTP security headers analysis:
1. Present headers verification
2. Missing headers identification
3. Configuration analysis
4. Improvement recommendations
prompt_format:
Analyze the security headers in this HTTP interaction. Please provide your response in plain text only, without using any special characters, emojis, or Unicode symbols.

Use '[PRESENT]' or '[MISSING]' to indicate header status.

For each security header:
1. Check if it exists
2. Analyze its configuration
3. Indicate security implications
4. Provide specific recommendations

Required format:
Header: [STATUS]
Configuration: [DETAILS]
Risk: [DESCRIPTION]
Recommendation: [SPECIFIC FIXES]

Follow with an overall security assessment and prioritized recommendations.
